segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, stretching to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s balancing so precariously, and the stool looks like it’s about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for him to hand her a cookie, completely focused on the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re both going to end up in a heap on the floor if they’re not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is making the floor even more dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman hasn’t noticed any of this yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll react in time to stop any of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm, like nothing is wrong at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the kids don’t slip on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR
